reviewtext: We were looking for something to reinforce addition and subtraction.  This game is a great tool.  It only goes up to 6 on each dice so you can only go as far as 12 but still has really helped.  It is cute with 4 reptiles as token to move and has a couple of neat ways to play with shortcuts.  We like this purchase.  Just what we needed.
summary: Great fun for learning addition and subtraction.
